overview: Mike Reiman strengthens KingsIsle with eighteen years of engineering and product development experience and an in-depth knowledge of various networking technologies and systems. Prior to joining KingsIsle, Mike served as the Chief Technical Officer of the Communication Business of Tektronix, Inc. Mike also served as the CTO of Inet Technologies, Inc. prior to its acquisition by Tektronix, Inc. in 2004. Mike began his service with Inet in 1990, and prior to assuming the CTO role, he served as Vice President, Diagnostics Products Division and in various other critical roles, including Vice President of Research & Development for telecommunications software platforms.
